item.description:
Join us for a day of Polo, food, fun, and games! July 24, 2010.

You can join us early or join us late - we may take this event into the evening anything goes - lol..

Bring food, chair, and/or blanket, as well as your favorite beverage.

We want to tailgate.
- Does anyone have a table top grill?
- Does anyone have a pop up canopy?

Some of us are planning to arrive early for set up and plan to stay late for a day full of food, fun, polo, friendship, and games - it depends on the space we get when we arrive.

We are planning to leave the Bed, Bath & Beyond Parking lot at 1:45PM (its about 15 min. then a car line to get in) - for those that want to carpool, follow as a group, and/or go early to the event. If you miss us at Bed, Bath, & Beyond call or text my cell to find out our location in the field.

Please check back and check your email for any changes - this will be a fun day - so we may add some things ...


The Polo Event is:

5PM - USA vs. Ireland - $10.00pp

Check out the Website: http://www.glenfarm.c...
On Saturday, July 24, 2010 - There will be many spectators with conflicting loyalties when the Irish Polo Team makes its 19th consecutive appearance at the Newport International Polo Series on Saturday, July 24th, defending last seasonâ€™s victory against USA
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet leave Bed, Bath, and Beyond parking lot 1:45PM prompt, E. Main Rd. Middletown, and carpool from there. Lonnie's cell: 401-829-8516
item.name: Newport Polo Match - USA vs. Ireland - Fun Day.....
